title: Mind Reader Plastic Rice Washer Strainer Colander with Handle, Washes Grains, Vegetables, Fruits, Rice, Pasta, Beans, and Lentils, Two Sizes Included, White, 2-Pack
features: TWO PACK FOOD STRAINERS: Includes two sizes of strainers colanders for washing and rinsing grains, vegetables, fruits, and more. The large strainer is ideal for big portions and a smaller one is designed for smaller portions.

TINY HOLES FOR STRAINING: The holes in these two strainers are small enough that you can strain most beans, pastas, and grains as well fruits and vegetables without any worries of food falling through.
MULTI-USE: Not only can you use these handy strainers to wash rice and other grains, you can also use them to wash beans, lentils, fruits, vegetables, and pasta.

EASY TO USE: A handle on top of the strainer allows for quick and easy draining of water from the strainer. It also allows you to drain hot foods such as cooked pasta or grains without getting burned from the steam.
DIMENSIONS: The small strainer measures 8 in. L x 3.5 in. W x 9.5 in. H and the large strainer measures 10.4 in. L x 4.75 in. W x 11.5 in. H.
FOOD SAFE MATERIAL: The plastic strainers are made with food safe plastic so it is safe to use them for handling foods.
DURABLE PLASTIC: They are made with thick, durable plastic that is designed to last a long time, even with frequent use.
HOT & COLD FOODS: These strainers can handle both hot or cold foods. The plastic construction is heat-resistant and safe to use for straining cooked foods such as pasta, rice, and vegetables.
CURVED EDGE PREVENTS SPILLS: The curved lip at the top edge of the strainer makes it easy to tip the strainer to strain water from foods without worrying about food spilling out.
EASY CLEAN: These plastic strainers are machine washable for easy care. They can also be hand washed with soap and water.
description: Wash everything from berries and vegetables to rice and other grains with the Mind Reader 2-Pack Plastic Strainer with Handles.
